name: Speeding Box - A Simple Platformer
description:
This is the first game that I've tried developing outside of college without any outside aid. And is playable.

A simple start to finish game no longer than 2 minutes and less than 1 minute if your fast enough. All your deaths will be shown on the map with a darker square indicating where you've previously died.

The first Two levels are for experimenting with the controls and getting used to them. The controls are not shown or told to the player. Its a platformer. Figure it out.

There is a timer at the top left at all times, it will not start until you move. This game was never intended to be a speed running game, but because it was so short, I thought I'd implement a timer.

The last two levels are 100% possible and not too hard if you have the controls down.
